results.title: Menlo Park Patents Teams Up with Trademark Owl to Empower Startups at ...
results.content: LAS VEGAS, NEVADA, USA, January 5, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- Menlo Park Patents, a prominent patent firm based in Tampa, FL, is dedicated to fostering innovation by offering a unique opportunity at CES 2024.

Today weâ€™re going to dispel a few myths about patents.
Myth 1: You need a prototype to apply for patent protection.
Truth: A prototype is not needed to apply for a patent!
Myth 2: I need a prior art search in order to apply for a patent.
Truth:Â A prior art search is not needed to apply.Â Itâ€™s optional and only needed in certain business situations.
Myth 3: You can patent a logo and business name.
Truth:Â Â A trademark is used to protect your business logo or name. Patents protect how an invention functions and its outer appearance.
Check out our partners at trademarkowl.com if you need a trademark.
